If this song is continued by… “I keep my distanceBut you still catch my eyeTell me, babyDo you recognize me?Well, it's been a yearIt doesn't surprise me… Last Christmas, I gave you my heartBut the very next day you gave it awayThis year, to save me from tearsI'll give it to someone special” I know I skipped a verse but I love this Christmas song titled “Last Christmas” which can also fall into the breakup song category. I believe it was originally sung by Wham! but has been covered by various artists such as Taylor Swift and Ariana Grande.
